resources.string: A vibrant color from the picture.
A vibrant and dark color from the picture.
A vibrant and light color from the picture.
A muted color from the picture.
A muted and dark color from the picture.
A muted and light color from the picture.

"Picolor is an app to extract prominent colors from an image. 
A number of colors with different profiles are extracted from the image: > Vibrant > Vibrant Dark > Vibrant Light > Muted > Muted Dark > Muted Light 
> Source code on GitHub: [https://github.com/by-syk/Picolor](https://github.com/by-syk/Picolor) 
Copyright © 2016 By_syk. All rights reserved."
